body.p: OpenLDAP is being upgraded to 2.3, requiring a few caveats from users, reports this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The Gentoo Forum administrators have opened a thread requesting comments on the addition of new subforums. Plenty of news from the community, a new Howto in the unofficial Gentoo Wiki, and of course the usual bugzilla statistics (back to their one-week-schedule) and all Gentoo Linux Security Announcements (GLSA) of last week complete this edition. Enjoy reading!
